publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1537# Dr Elaine Murray: Dumfries and Galloway Royal Infirmary—That the Parliament offers its congratulations to the Ear, Nose and Throat Department and the Breast Clinic of Dumfries and Galloway Royal Infirmary on being awarded the Charter Mark in recognition of their excellent services to the people of Dumfries and Galloway.
S1M-1537# Dumfries and Galloway Royal Infirmary (lodged on 15 January 2001) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1537# Dr Elaine Murray: Dumfries and Galloway Royal Infirmary—That the Parliament offers its congratulations to the Ear, Nose and Throat Department and the Breast Clinic of Dumfries and Galloway Royal Infirmary on being awarded the Charter Mark in recognition of their excellent services to the people of Dumfries and Galloway. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1537# Dumfries and Galloway Royal Infirmary (lodged on 15 January 2001) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-1537# Dumfries and Galloway Royal Infirmary (lodged on 15 January 2001) David Mundell*

Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Pauline McNeill, David Mundell, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Alasdair Morgan, Michael Russell
